desc:
Probable 20% damage reduction, damage taken may restore HP & boosts Atk, Def relative to remaining HP
*Activates Guild Raid skill

dictionary.lore: Named after the Vardket deity of travel, commerce, and jewelry, this coil of minerals and bone is enriched with additional mineralizing baths and oral supplements as it binds itself to the user's skeleton and flesh. As a result, its cleansing properties allows the user to double (or even triple) their strength as long as they remain uninjured. None save the most potent poisons and illnesses will plague their bodies. "Purify the waters with force." can be found written in its seed sections in the Vardket tongue.

name: Nhe'hed's Wish
